name: Other party has responded (disputed / not disputed) solicitor
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
Applicant: ((applicant name))
Respondent: ((respondent name))
Issue date: ((date of issue))
Response: ((isUndisputed??Undisputed))((isDisputed??Disputed))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name))

The court has received a Response in this ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)) application. The respondent is ((isUndisputed??not ))disputing the application.((isDisputed??

They need to submit an Answer by ))((issue date plus 37 days))((isDisputed??.))

Read the Response: ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Response received: ((reference number))
